artist: Artist: René Ben Sussan; Printer: Oxford University Press, Oxford, England; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: pattern paper (salmon/cream) wrapper over boards, label printed in black affixed; endpapers: white laid; slip case: pattern paper over cardboard, inner sleeve of salmon-colored laid paper (exterior) and salmon/creme pattern paer (interior); pattern matches slip case and book wrapper; label printed in black affixed to spine of inner sleeve; type: Fell; 186 pp.
markings: Watermark: Papier d\'Auvergne à la main
title: The School for Scandal
